Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text:
King Breakfast was definitely king size. A long craving for English breakfast was fulfilling and satisfying. The hash browns were quite big. Sausage was nicely cooked. It was a hearty breakfast before we set off to Thorpe park.
Good service from the staffs.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: We come to this cafe regularly, and nothing is ever to much trouble. We are always welcomed with a smile, always quick service and the food is always spot on!! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Popped in for lunch and had the eggs Benedict with smoked salmon. It was delicious. Very friendly service. I‚Äôll be back soon for breakfast!

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text:
Good food polite clean cafe this is important these days.
Milk shake the best I have had in any cafe nice and thick just like a well known burger joint.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Lovely cafe on the High Street. Very nice coffee. Had a full English, sausage was a bit of a let down. Other than that though, food was reasonably priced, tasty and hot. Special discounts for OAPs as well, which is a great way to give back ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Pleasant staff good food and big portions at a great price üëç

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Prices have gone up alot from when we first went there.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: 1 of my favourites, lovely staff and great chef they have a laugh and make you at home.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Good service great food would recommend

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Arrived at welling cafe for the first time in over 2 years and our experience was wonderful especially in these times lady‚Äôs working very efficient and highly friendly the chefs special spot on runny egg bacon done fresh crusty bread perfect start to our day look forward to returning many thanks keep up the hard lady‚Äôs and chef

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: enjoyed the food so much, the staff was very nice and chef is very friendly

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Best cafe in the town, delicious food and 5 star customer service thank you welling cafe.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Best Turkish breakfast I have ever had. Chef Alex was very friendly and polite . Best cafe in the area . Will come again.

Name: Cafe Welling
Review Text: Good service, very good food. I will revisit when in the area.
